# 1. Naples (NAPL)

## a. algae biomass timeseries
```{r}
napl_algae_plot_list <- list()

for(i in 1:length(algae_spp)) {
  this_sp <- algae_spp[i]
  
  napl_algae_plot_list[[i]] <- spp_biomass_ts(this_sp, "NAPL")
}

# Anisocladella pacifica
napl_algae_plot_list[[1]]
# Acrosorium ciliolatum
napl_algae_plot_list[[2]]
```
